reviews.review_msg: I found Dr. Kelly's approach to be sincere and rigorous.  She is a knowledge-keeper and a brilliant storyteller.  Perhaps the best teacher I have ever known.  An artist in the truest sense, and a lecturer of the highest order.  Simply outstanding.

If you love flute solos, expressing theories through forming human tableaus and pastel drawing in a graduate level course on Educational Research Methods, then this is the course for you. If you are serious about scholarship and are looking for a prof who knows her stuff and is open to discussion of serious ideas, STAY AWAY!
This instructor knows her stuff. I've never worked so hard for a course, but she worked harder than any of us. LOTS of feedback. Very caring and community minded. Wish she taught all our courses!
